name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 086
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. Please Stand By, Netflix Joined Team TERF. On October 5th, Netflix released “The Closer,” the much anticipated new standup from comedian Dave Chapelle, in which he spends the majority of his set commenting mockingly on transgender people and aligns himself with author JK Rowling as “Team TERF.” This has thrust the one time media darling Netflix into an unusual position, embroiled in controversy as employees challenge the executives responsible for the success of this special and its promotion of hate speech. I’m not touching this issue with a 10 foot pole but it’s a bad look for Netflix, and it’s reaction has been less than optimal, firing some trans employees that have challenged them and standing by the message of Chapelle’s standup routine.
